participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing her interests and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood. I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad. My favorite coffee is french vanilla. I listen to classical music. I wash my uniforms every week because I work at an animal clinic.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and expressive, Sofia loves to explore creative outlets and enjoys sharing her passions with others.
participant_2.background: I dance to K-pop music to express myself. I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way. I enjoy home cooked meals. Lately I've been learning how to garden. I work some very odd jobs.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
Pretty good, thanks! Just got done working on a garden project.
Oh, cool! What kind of garden project?
I'm working on starting a vegetable garden. I'm excited to see how it turns out!
That's awesome! I love gardening. I have a small herb garden that I love to tend to.
That's great! I love herbs. What kind of herbs do you have?
I have basil, oregano, thyme, rosemary, and parsley.
Oh, nice! I have basil, thyme, and rosemary. I'm trying to grow some mint, but it's not doing too well.
Mint is a little tricky to grow. I've had better luck with it in a pot than in the ground.
That's good to know. Maybe I'll try that.
I hope it works out!
Thanks!
Have you heard of K-pop?
Yes, I have! I love K-pop!
Me too! I love dancing to it.
Me too! It's so much fun.
I've been learning some dance moves lately.
Oh, that's awesome! I've been meaning to learn some too.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will!
It's great to meet another K-pop fan!
Me too
